objects.text: Zip-Up Sweat Set with Wide Leg Jogging Pants

product_details.name: Women's 2 Piece Lounge Outfits Zip Up Sweat Set Contrast Striped Wide Leg Jogging Pants Travel Track Suit
product_details.description: Package Dimensions: 14.14 x 12.37 x 1.85 inches; 1.43 Pounds. Department: Women. Customer Reviews: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 402 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, fashion-forward layout designed to promote a stylish apparel piece. The background includes a soft diagonal gradient in shades of light grey, overlaid with wavy green accents at the top and bottom to frame the content. An abstract grid pattern in the corners adds a subtle visual texture. The central focus is a product image of a green tracksuit, strategically placed within translucent concentric circles for emphasis.

Text layer `heading` provides a bold and stylish title in uppercase green typography. Below it, the `subheading` adds a supporting tagline in a darker font. A succinct product description is presented through the `description` text layer near the bottom. Pricing is displayed prominently in text layer `price`, placed just above a bold green call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled with the `cta` text layer reading “SHOP NOW”.

**Color Palette:**
- Emerald Green #009944
- Deep Green Gradient #007733
- Light Green Accent #00cc44
- Darker Accent Green #00aa44
- Charcoal Black #333333
- White #FFFFFF
- Light Grey Gradient #f2f2f2 to #e6e6e6
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant green tracksuit with distinct white stripe detailing, creating a bold and energetic visual appeal. The dominant green color (#00894C) conveys vitality and freshness, making it ideal for a sporty, lifestyle-oriented advertisement banner. The crisp white stripes (#FFFFFF) provide visual contrast that enhances the suit’s structure and inspires a sense of modernity and movement. These two tones are well-blended, with the green serving as a strong canvas and the white highlights adding dynamic character. Accent colors like soft skin tones (#FADBCB) and neutral shoe white (#F4F4F4) can also be used subtly in the background.
